body_html:
I have the same issue while training. I tried reducing batch size and # of layers but throws the same error.
The core dumped message pops up just before completing one epoch.
tensorflow version = 1.8

61/62 [============================>.] - ETA: 0s - loss: 0.4864 - dice_coef: 0.5136[1] 24623 floating point exception (core dumped)

body:
I have the same issue while training. I tried reducing batch size and # of layers but throws the same error.
The core dumped message pops up just before completing one epoch.
tensorflow version = 1.8

`61/62 [============================>.] - ETA: 0s - loss: 0.4864 - dice_coef: 0.5136[1] 24623 floating point exception (core dumped)`
